name: Entangled (itch) (OrianK, Aviad Cohen, ereldebel, alon153, galrubin13)
name_original: Entangled (itch) (OrianK, Aviad Cohen, ereldebel, alon153, galrubin13)
description:
ENTANGLED is a fast-paced, roguelike game.

In the game, you will be assisted by a spiritual yo-yo-like weapon which can be used both for direct attacks and for neat combos and tricks.

As you play, you will have the opportunities to upgrade your abilities. But beware, for every gift has its cost!

Controls:

This game is only playable with a controller

Movement Left StickAim weapon Right  Stick Roll LB (L1)Attack RB (R1)Special Attack
Hold RT (R2) + Right  Stick Interact A (🞨)Show MapHold Y (△)Pause 
Start (Options) Credits:

Developers: Erel Debel, Alon Levy
Designers: Orian Kidron, Aviad Cohen, Gal Rubin
Guidance: Eran Hilleli, Doron Assayas Terre, Gideon Rimmer

The game was made as part of a game jam course in Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design & Hebrew University, 2023.
